commit message:
Merge branch 'hotfix/5.0.2' into develop

Conflicts:
CHANGELOG.md
app/src/main/res/values/strings_prefs.xml
Display play quantity in all lists (not just game)
add padding and dividers to the list of geek lists
add padding to the list of colors and game details
Add padding and dividers to comments list
Add bottom padding to collection, buddies, and buddy's collection
Always pad the bottom of sticky header lists
Use the new AppCompatDelegate for the Preference activity
Fix forum and GeekList links and images
Handle incomplete forum data returned from BGG
Handle incomplete thing data returned from BGG
Remove section headers from nav drawer and adjust dimensions to be in line with material spec
Add header to nav drawer when logged in; tweak styles to match material spec better
Refactor code that creates a full name
Add ability to sync user information to preferences and display it in the nav drawer
Make buddy icons in rows circular
Correct grouping when sorting by rank (e.g. rank 100 now appears in 1-100, not 101-250)
Start a sync when these settings change
Export game colors and refactor exporter to support multiple export types
Avoid NPE in collection fragment (as seen in Fabric)
Trim whitespace when renaming players and locations
Refactor setting subtitles in Location and Player activity
Add debug logging to color fragment and activity
If played games aren't synced, allow the user to enable this preference
Checking out a new local repo to rebuild from the crash
Pull the subtitle setting up to BaseActivity
Small refactorings - null checks, comments, etc.
Add PlayerColors to the content provider
Add the ability to create and sort a player's favorite colors
Show top 3 colors on the buddy fragment
Add a color list for the signed-in user
Rename BuddyColor to UserColor in content provider
Add a provider for playercolors (all, not per user)
Tidy up the Game model class
Replace themable menu icons with direct drawables
BuddyColorsActivity uses a toolbar as its action bar
Allow back to work when viewing owner's color list
Position nav drawer on top of action bar (in part, by making it a tool bar)
Allow nav drawer to scroll under the status bar instead of behind it
Remove need for activity_home layout file
Restore the toolbar in the Settings Activity
Assign colors based on a player's top choice, then random
Assign colors based on a player's top choice, then random

Merge branch 'feature/player-colors' of https://github.com/ccomeaux/boardgamegeek4android into feature/player-colors

Conflicts:
app/src/main/res/values/strings.xml
Fix some color assigning bugs and improve the assignment algorithm
Update Crashlytics library and deprecated calls
Use the full image for non-thumbnail images (better support for palette colors)
When describing length, don't include minutes of there are none.
Don't retain the color when reshowing the add color dialog
Correctly display action mode over the toolbar
Add better data checking in action mode
Shrink the size of the num pad buttons to better fit on the screen
Don't update time based UI if the fragment isn't attached (I saw it crash)
Improve look of the numeric readout
